languages.text: Первым приказом Риззы после ее чудесного спасения на Футфоле стало полное истребление всех почитателей Темных богов в рядах Пустотного братства. Старая пиратка попыталась отыскать для своих людей иной путь к выживанию. Вчерашние налетчики надеялись обрести снисхождение закона, выступая в качестве наемников и торговцев. Когда казалось, что им удалось ступить на мирную стезю, в молниеносной облаве Имперского флота все корабли их были уничтожены, а пережившие страшную бойню — вздернуты при стечении народа.

The first command that Ryzza issued after her miraculous rescue on Footfall was the complete extermination of all worshippers of the Dark Gods among the Fellowship of the Void. The old pirate wanted to find another way for her people to survive. The former renegades hoped to live by the law working as mercenaries and traders. When it seemed they were finally on the path to a peaceful life, the Imperial Navy conducted a flash raid and destroyed all their ships. Those who survived the bloodbath were publicly hanged.
languages.original_text: Первым приказом Риззы после ее чудесного спасения на Футфоле стало полное истребление всех почитателей Темных богов в рядах Пустотного братства. Старая пиратка попыталась отыскать для своих людей иной путь к выживанию. Вчерашние налетчики надеялись обрести снисхождение закона, выступая в качестве наемников и торговцев. Когда казалось, что им удалось ступить на мирную стезю, в молниеносной облаве Имперского флота все корабли их были уничтожены, а пережившие страшную бойню — вздернуты при стечении народа.

traits.locale_text: The first command that Ryzza issued after her miraculous rescue on Footfall was the complete extermination of all worshippers of the Dark Gods among the Fellowship of the Void. The old pirate wanted to find another way for her people to survive. Former bandits hoped to earn the condescension of the law, working as mercenaries and traders. When it finally seemed that they managed to start walking the path of lawfulness, an Imperial Navy conducted a flash raid and destroyed all of their ships. Those who survived this bloodbath were publicly executed by hanging.

The first command that Ryzza issued after her miraculous rescue on Footfall was the complete extermination of all worshippers of the Dark Gods among the Fellowship of the Void. When it finally seemed that they managed to start walking the path of lawfulness, an Imperial Navy conducted a flash raid and destroyed all of their ships. Those who survived this bloodbath were publicly executed by hanging.

Those who survived the bloodbath were publicly executed by hanging.

The old pirate wanted to find another way for her people to survive. The former renegades hoped to live by the law working as mercenaries and traders. When it seemed they were finally on the path to lawfulness, the Imperial Navy conducted a flash raid and destroyed all their ships. Those who survived the bloodbath were publicly executed by hanging.

The old pirate wanted to find another way for her people to survive. The former renegades hoped to live by the law working as mercenaries and traders. When it seemed they were finally on the path to a peaceful life, the Imperial Navy conducted a flash raid and destroyed all their ships. Those who survived the bloodbath were publicly hanged.

The first command that Ryzza issued after her miraculous rescue on Footfall was the complete extermination of all worshippers of the Dark Gods among the Fellowship of the Void. The old pirate wanted to find another way for her people to survive. The former renegades hoped to live by the law working as mercenaries and traders. When it seemed they were finally on the path to a peaceful life, the Imperial Navy conducted a flash raid and destroyed all their ships. Those who survived the bloodbath were publicly hanged.

languages.text: 当莱萨在落脚港奇迹般地逃过一劫之后，她下达的第一个命令就是彻底消灭虚空协联之中的黑暗诸神信徒。这个老海盗想给她的手下找到另一条生存之路，这些曾经的罪人希望能以雇佣兵或商人的身份，过着遵规守法的生活。当他们似乎终于踏上了遵守法纪的道路时，帝国海军突然发起了一次闪电般的袭击，摧毁了他们所有舰船，而那些在屠杀中侥幸存活的人则被公开绞死。
languages.original_text: The first command that Ryzza issued after her miraculous rescue on Footfall was the complete extermination of all worshippers of the Dark Gods among the Fellowship of the Void. The old pirate wanted to find another way for her people to survive. The former renegades hoped to live by the law working as mercenaries and traders. When it seemed they were finally on the path to a peaceful life, the Imperial Navy conducted a flash raid and destroyed all their ships. Those who survived the bloodbath were publicly hanged.

traits.locale_text: 当莱萨在落脚港奇迹般地逃过一劫之后，她下达的第一个命令就是彻底消灭虚空协联之中的黑暗诸神信徒。这个老海盗想给她的手下找到另一条生存之路，这些曾经的罪人希望能以雇佣兵或商人的身份，过着遵规守法的生活。当他们似乎终于踏上了遵守法纪的道路时，帝国海军突然发起了一次闪电般的袭击，摧毁了他们所有舰船，而那些在屠杀中侥幸存活的人则被公开处以绞刑。

languages.text: Der erste Befehl, den Ryzza nach ihrer wundersamen Rettung auf Footfall erteilte, war die vollständige Auslöschung aller Anbeter der Dunklen Götter unter den Gefährten der Leere. Die alte Piratin wollte eine andere Möglichkeit finden, wie ihre Leute überleben konnten. Die ehemaligen Abtrünnigen hofften, gesetzestreu als Söldner und Händler leben zu können. Gerade, als es schien, als seien sie endlich auf dem Pfad zu einem friedlichen Leben angelangt, führte die imperiale Kriegsflotte eine Razzia durch und zerstörte alle ihre Schiffe. Wer das Blutbad überlebt hatte, wurde öffentlich gehängt.
languages.original_text: The first command that Ryzza issued after her miraculous rescue on Footfall was the complete extermination of all worshippers of the Dark Gods among the Fellowship of the Void. The old pirate wanted to find another way for her people to survive. The former renegades hoped to live by the law working as mercenaries and traders. When it seemed they were finally on the path to a peaceful life, the Imperial Navy conducted a flash raid and destroyed all their ships. Those who survived the bloodbath were publicly hanged.

traits.locale_text: Der erste Befehl, den Ryzza nach ihrer wundersamen Rettung auf Footfall erteilte, war die vollständige Auslöschung aller Anbeter der Dunklen Götter unter den Gefährten der Leere. Die alte Piratin wollte eine andere Möglichkeit finden, wie ihre Leute überleben konnten. Die ehemaligen Abtrünnigen hofften, gesetzestreu als Söldner und Händler leben zu können. Gerade, als es schien, als seien sie endlich auf dem Pfad der Gesetzestreue angelangt, führte die imperiale Kriegsflotte eine Razzia durch und zerstörte alle ihre Schiffe. Wer das Blutbad überlebt hatte, wurde öffentlich durch Erhängen hingerichtet.

languages.text: Après son sauvetage miraculeux à Castel, le premier ordre que Ryzza donna fut l'extermination totale de tous les adorateurs des Dieux Sombres au sein de la Communauté du vide. La vieille pirate voulait trouver une autre solution pour aider ses acolytes à survivre. Les anciens renégats espéraient ainsi vivre dans le respect des lois en travaillant comme mercenaires et commerçants. Alors qu'ils semblaient enfin retourner sur le droit chemin, la Marine impériale les frappa d'un raid éclair qui détruisit tous leurs vaisseaux. Ceux qui avaient survécu au bain de sang furent pendus sur la place publique.
languages.original_text: The first command that Ryzza issued after her miraculous rescue on Footfall was the complete extermination of all worshippers of the Dark Gods among the Fellowship of the Void. The old pirate wanted to find another way for her people to survive. The former renegades hoped to live by the law working as mercenaries and traders. When it seemed they were finally on the path to a peaceful life, the Imperial Navy conducted a flash raid and destroyed all their ships. Those who survived the bloodbath were publicly hanged.

traits.locale_text: Après son sauvetage miraculeux à Castel, le premier ordre que Ryzza donna fut l'extermination totale de tous les adorateurs des Dieux Sombres au sein de la Communauté du vide. La vieille pirate voulait trouver une autre solution pour aider ses acolytes à survivre. Les anciens renégats espéraient ainsi vivre dans le respect des lois en travaillant comme mercenaires et commerçants. Alors qu'ils semblaient enfin retourner sur le droit chemin, la Marine impériale les frappa d'un raid éclair qui détruisit tous leurs vaisseaux. Ceux qui avaient survécu au bain de sang furent exécutés publiquement par pendaison.

languages.text: La primera orden de Ryzza tras su milagroso rescate en Paso fue el exterminio absoluto de todos los adoradores de los Dioses Oscuros de la Hermandad del Vacío. La vieja pirata quería encontrar otra forma de que su gente sobreviviera. Los antiguos renegados esperaban vivir siguiendo la ley como mercenarios y comerciantes. Cuando por fin parecían estar en la senda de la paz, la Armada Imperial lanzó un asalto relámpago y destruyó todas sus naves. Los supervivientes a ese baño de sangre acabaron ahorcados en una ejecución pública.
languages.original_text: The first command that Ryzza issued after her miraculous rescue on Footfall was the complete extermination of all worshippers of the Dark Gods among the Fellowship of the Void. The old pirate wanted to find another way for her people to survive. The former renegades hoped to live by the law working as mercenaries and traders. When it seemed they were finally on the path to a peaceful life, the Imperial Navy conducted a flash raid and destroyed all their ships. Those who survived the bloodbath were publicly hanged.

traits.locale_text: La primera orden de Ryzza tras su milagroso rescate en Paso fue el exterminio absoluto de todos los adoradores de los Dioses Oscuros de la Hermandad del Vacío. La vieja pirata quería encontrar otra forma de que su gente sobreviviera. Los antiguos renegados esperaban vivir siguiendo la ley como mercenarios y comerciantes. Cuando por fin parecían estar en la senda de la legalidad, la Armada Imperial lanzó un asalto relámpago y destruyó todas sus naves. Los supervivientes a ese baño de sangre acabaron ahorcados en una ejecución pública.

languages.text: フットフォールでの奇跡的な救出後、リザが出した最初の命令は、虚空の仲間の中にいる暗黒神を崇拝する者すべてを完全に抹殺することだった。年老いた海賊は、同族が生き残るための別の道を見つけたいと思っていた。かつての反逆者たちは、傭兵や商人として働きながら平和に生きることを望んでいた。彼らがようやく遵法への道を歩み始めたと思われたとき、帝国海軍は電撃作戦を実行に移して彼らの船をすべて破壊した。大虐殺を生き延びた者は絞首刑に処された。
languages.original_text: The first command that Ryzza issued after her miraculous rescue on Footfall was the complete extermination of all worshippers of the Dark Gods among the Fellowship of the Void. The old pirate wanted to find another way for her people to survive. The former renegades hoped to live by the law working as mercenaries and traders. When it seemed they were finally on the path to a peaceful life, the Imperial Navy conducted a flash raid and destroyed all their ships. Those who survived the bloodbath were publicly hanged.

traits.locale_text: フットフォールでの奇跡的な救出後、リザが出した最初の命令は、虚空の仲間の中にいる暗黒神を崇拝する者すべてを完全に抹殺することだった。年老いた海賊は、同族が生き残るための別の道を見つけたいと思っていた。かつての反逆者たちは、傭兵や商人として働きながら平和に生きることを望んでいた。彼らがようやく遵法への道を歩み始めたと思われたとき、帝国海軍は電撃作戦を実行に移して彼らの船をすべて破壊した。大虐殺を生き延びた者は絞首刑に処された。

languages.text: Binliman'dan mucizevi bir şekilde kurtulan Ryzza'nın ilk emri, Uçsuz Kardeşliği içinde Kara Tanrılara tapan herkesin hepten yok edilmesi oldu. İhtiyar korsan, halkının sağ kalmasını sağlayacak başka bir yol bulmak istiyordu. Eskinin kanunsuzları, paralı asker ve tacir olarak çalışarak kanuni bir hayat sürmeyi denedi. Tam da huzurlu bir yaşama kavuşacakları sırada İmparatorluk Donanması, ani bir baskın ile tüm gemilerini yok etti. Bu kan banyosundan sağ kurtulanlar ise meydanlarda halkın huzurunda asıldı.
languages.original_text: The first command that Ryzza issued after her miraculous rescue on Footfall was the complete extermination of all worshippers of the Dark Gods among the Fellowship of the Void. The old pirate wanted to find another way for her people to survive. The former renegades hoped to live by the law working as mercenaries and traders. When it seemed they were finally on the path to a peaceful life, the Imperial Navy conducted a flash raid and destroyed all their ships. Those who survived the bloodbath were publicly hanged.

traits.locale_text: Binliman'dan mucizevi bir şekilde kurtulan Ryzza'nın ilk emri, Uçsuz Kardeşliği içinde Karanlık Tanrılara tapan herkesin tamamen yok edilmesiydi. İhtiyar korsan, halkının hayatta kalabilmesi için başka bir yol bulmak istiyordu. Eskinin kanunsuzları, paralı asker ve tacir olarak çalışarak kanunlara saygılı bir yaşam sürmeyi denediler. Tam da huzurlu bir yaşama kavuşuyor gibilerken İmparatorluk Donanması ani bir baskın düzenledi ve tüm gemilerini yok etti. Bu kan banyosundan sağ kurtulanlar ise halka açık bir şekilde asıldı.
